job.title: Full Stack Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a FullStack Senior Engineer who is proficient in React Python and DjangoppbrppstrongWho are westrongppWe are an industry leading technology company in the contenttocommerce space Our industry leading platform generates 15 Billion events per day and our active user base hits around 100 million per monthppnbspppstrongWhats the jobstrongppAs our newest software engineer you will be responsible for the development of our custom SDK and BackEnd Javascript code base This SDK is core to our platform and triggers all of their core productsppYou will work extensively with React NPM webpack and Python while ensuring best practices participating in paired programming with other developers and much more to take our software to the next levelppThis position is ideally suited for a strong generalist who has the ability to assess problems lead implementation and has the autonomy to self learn new technologiesppnbspppstrongWhat are the required skills for the jobstrongpulliProficiency in Javascript and JS PatternsliliDeep understanding of ReactliliExperience with modern frontend build pipelines and tools such as Babel WebpackliliExperience building APIs with Python and the Django frameworkliliExperience with cloud hosting GCP or AWSliliStrong understanding of how web applications work including APIs REST GraphQLliliYou can design and implement solutions that are efficient flexible and scalableliulpnbspppstrongWhy join our organizationstrongppYou will solve complex and interesting problems related to distributed systems We are a high velocity shop and capable of implementing brand new software and services within two weeks Our deadlines are completely internal and not tied to our clientsppbrppWe are a small team of like minded engineers and there will be no shortage of opportunities for project ownership and the ability to influence our technology stack This is a great opportunity for growth and to gain exposure to a number of new technologies that broaden your tool set We are not corporate and you will see you work in action immediatelyppbrppOur head office is in NYC and we have other satellite offices across the US This position has the ability to be fullyremote or you can go on site at one of our offices whenever you please We work on Eastern Standard Time EST We are doing extremely well and plan to double in size within the next year with a heavy focus on developing our Engineering team Its a great time to join usppnbspppstrongWhat is the compstrongppWe offer a fully comprehensive compensation package and full suite of benefitspulliBase Salary 135000  150000liliStock OptionsliliMedical Dental Vision 401k among othersliulpbrppIf working on a small team for an industry leading startup then please apply today or emailnbspanareichenbachaverityteamcomp
